poem:
Your smile’s the dawn, the break of light,🌅
It makes the darkest moments bright.✨

Jiya, your laughter fills the air,🎶
Like music dancing everywhere.💃

In every breeze and morning dew,🌬️💧
My heart just softly thinks of you.❤️

Eyes like twilight, calm and deep,🌌
Where all my restless thoughts now sleep.😌

Your beauty’s not just skin or face—🌹
It’s warmth, and charm, and endless grace.🌟

If stars could write, they’d pen your name,🌠
In constellations made of flame.🔥

No artist’s brush, nor poet’s rhyme,🎨🖋️
Could sketch your soul or freeze your time.⏳

The flowers blush when you walk near,🌸😊
You steal their color and their cheer.🌼

Jiya, you're poetry in bloom,🌺📖
A rose that lights up every room.🏠

With every step, you change the day,👣☀️
In colors words can't quite convey.🎨

When you speak, the silence grins,😶😊
Even quiet finds its wings.🕊️

Your eyes—two oceans, pure and wide,🌊👁️
Where truth and wonder both reside.🔍✨

No mirror shows your truest hue,🪞🎨
It lives in how the world loves you.🌍❤️

Jiya, you're stardust, bold and sweet,🌟🍬
The galaxy bows at your feet.🌌🙏

Beauty isn't what you wear,👗🚫
It’s who you are, and how you care.💖

The world grows calm when you appear,🌍🧘
Like storms retreat when skies are clear.⛅

Your heart is kind, your laugh divine,💓😄
A soul like yours could only shine.🌟

Like moonlight on a silver stream,🌙🌊
You drift into my every dream.💭

Your presence is a lullaby,🎵😴
Soft and sweet as stars on high.⭐

Jiya, you're a world so rare,🌍💎
With every breath, a work of care.💨❤️

You're art without a frame or name,🖼️❌
A song without a need for fame.🎶

Like jasmine blooms on quiet nights,🌼🌙
Your spirit glows in gentle light.✨

The way you smile, the way you stand—😊🧍
Like grace just chose to hold your hand.🤝

You’re what the morning sun would say,🌅🗣️
If it could whisper joy your way.😊

Jiya, you're peace in every storm,🕊️🌩️
A heart that’s wild, yet safe and warm.🔥

When beauty sleeps, it dreams of you,💤🌸
With skies of pink and oceans blue.🌸🌊

You're not a poem—I can't end,📜❌
You're every chapter I defend.📖🛡️

A glance from you could stop all time,👀⏰
A miracle in gentle rhyme.🌟

Jiya, even stars confess—🌠💬
They dim beside your loveliness.🌟❤️

Your soul is made of golden threads,🧵✨
And kindness in the words you've said.🗣️💛

No photograph could hold your light,📸🌟
It flickers softly through the night.🌙

Jiya, you're a sunset's grace,🌇💖
With twilight painted on your face.🎨

A single smile, a single glance—😊👁️
You give the air a chance to dance.💃🌬️

You're not just pretty, you're the muse,🎨🎶
The voice that makes the silence choose.🤫➡️🎵

You’re not a dream, you’re what dreams miss,💭💔
A heartbeat wrapped in stardust kiss.❤️🌠

Your beauty bends the rules of time,🕰️🎨
Like verses lost in perfect rhyme.📖

Even the stars get jealous too,🌟😒
Of all the magic found in you.✨

Jiya, you're the candle’s glow,🕯️😊
A warmth that even winds can't blow.💨❌

You walk in poems, move like grace,🚶‍♀️📜
And leave soft verses in your place.📝

When you are near, the world feels kind,🌍❤️
As if the sun forgot to mind.🌞

You hold the peace the oceans crave,🌊🕊️
The calmness only love can save.💗

Your beauty’s voice is never loud,🔇🌸
Yet somehow stands above the crowd.📢🎤

You're not just seen, you're deeply felt,👁️❤️
A fire where the coldest melt.🔥❄️

Each heartbeat sings your lovely name,❤️🎶
Each moment tries to do the same.⏳🎵

Jiya, when you laugh or sigh,😄😌
Even sorrow learns to fly.😢➡️🕊️

With you, the world feels not so wide,🌍💞
Like home lives deep inside your stride.🏡👣

You're not the sun, nor moon above—🌞🌙❌
You are the thing they chase: pure love.💘

A rose would wilt in your embrace,🌹💫
Just awed to meet such perfect grace.🙏

Jiya, your joy is wild and free,🎉🕊️
Like waves that hum eternally.🌊🎵

Every whisper, every glance—🗣️👁️
Feels like fate’s most perfect dance.💃🕺
